contested_territory._comment: Uses MythicGME fate checks to resolve contested territory claims. Likelihood based on faction level difference and relationship.

party_work_twists._comment: Generates oracle detail checks on extreme rolls (2 or 12) during faction work.

_notes: Oracle generates structured tokens (action/subject pairs, yes/no results) not invented facts.
The LLM narrator interprets these prompts into narrative context.
System remains fully playable with LLM disabled - oracle results display as raw tokens.

notes: This rules file implements the ELMC faction-turn procedure (3 actions per faction; roll d6; +/-1 mod capped; advance progress bar).
Economics/supplies are not tracked; resources are tags that provide situational +1 or impose -1 when opposed.
